comments.content: Canada is a great place to live, I did drive all the way from Vancouver to New York alone long long time ago. It took me 6 days to cross Canada, I took the easy route which was the no 1 highway, I did not drop by Toronto, just ended my trip in Montreal and then final stop in New York.

One of my friends also has stayed in  Toronto for years.  He told me that it is a beautiful city. I planned a trip from New York to Boston, do u recommend to put Toronto in the trip? What did u do in Canada? Studying  or immigration? 7 years is  long enough to complete a bachelor plus a mater degree.
Odd, I spent 8 years there and I've never seen you before.
Hey there, i would love to make more friends who can speak English, i was born and raised in South Africa( haha weird i know) , hope to chat to you soon, before i forget how to speak English
Hi, there! I am going to Calgary for learning English this year. Have you ever been to Calgary? Is there anything I shall pay special attention to while staying in Canada?

Last November, my friend and I took a vacation after a whole year working. We went to New Zealand for 12 days, and we drives by ourself. That was a fantastic trip in my life. hahaha I hope I can go there again.

Hi,
I see that you're a gamer, which I'm not, lol.
Anyway, nice to get to know you here. I would love to know why you spent 7 years in Toronto, and you experience there. I've never been to Toronto.
So, you've moved back to Taiwan now or you will go back to Toronto?

Hi there. I love traveling around the world and I am a foodie. I used to have a foodie club with my friend when I was living in LA. Now I am exploring all the authentic restaurant in Taipei. I love Japanese cruise and deep fried food. And you?
I want to be your friend and chat in English
